## DropErc1155ClaimConditions.prepareClaim() method

Returns proofs and the overrides required for the transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
prepareClaim(tokenId: BigNumberish, quantity: BigNumberish, checkERC20Allowance: boolean, address?: string): Promise<ClaimVerification>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter           | Type         | Description       |
| ------------------- | ------------ | ----------------- |
| tokenId             | BigNumberish |                   |
| quantity            | BigNumberish |                   |
| checkERC20Allowance | boolean      |                   |
| address             | string       | <i>(Optional)</i> |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[ClaimVerification](./sdk.claimverification.md)&gt;

- `overrides` and `proofs` as an object.
